name: Minute Arena
description:
Welcome to Minute Arena, our entry for Buddy Jam 10. We decided to make an arcade-like shooter game where the player has to endure waves of enemies in 60-second intervals. The game is unfortunately not entirely complete, but still playable. Enjoy!

Controls:
WASD - Move
Mouse & Left-Click - Aim & Shoot
Escape - Exit game

Our team:
Tricky_Triangles
Teh_Bucket
toiletsnakes
